description:
Famous for its cool world and innovatively omnidirectional shooting system, ZERO GUNNER 2, is coming back as ZERO GUNNER 2-.

Letâ€™s blast off every enemy's planes from various sides of your screen.

Fans who have enjoyed Psikyo Shooting will definitely enjoy this new Zero Gunner 2-.

The compilation of Psikyo shooting game, ZERO GUNNER 2-, is reviving now!!
name: ZERO GUNNER 2- for Nintendo Switch
intro: Psikyo Revival!! Play the good old arcade game!
